mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(board_no, fk_member_id, board_content, board_visibility, board_comment_allowed, board_register_date, board_parent_no, board_group_no, board_depth, board_is_delete) values(seq_board_no.nextVal, #{fk_member_id}, #{board_content}, #{board_visibility}, default, default, default, seq_board_no.currVal, default, default)
mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.fk_member_id, b.board_content, b.board_visibility, b.board_comment_allowed, b.board_register_date, b.board_parent_no, b.board_group_no, b.board_depth, b.board_is_delete, m.member_id, m.member_name from tbl_board b join tbl_member m on b.fk_member_id = m.member_id where b.board_is_delete = 0 order by b.board_no desc
mapper.update: update tbl_board set board_is_delete = 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
